Generate the gather file path.

Args:
base_dir: Base directory under which the output is stored.
Return:
Gather directory and file name, each as string.
get_layout_versions(base_dir)[source]¶

Detects which file structure version of the raw files.

Args:
base_dir: Base directory under which the raw directory can be
found.
Return:
The preprocess and layout module to use.
join(base_dir, use_xfel_format)[source]¶

Generates the join file path.

Args:

base_dir: Base directory under which the output is stored. use_xfel_format (bool): If enabled the output is in xfel

format.
Return:
Join directory and file name, each as string.
preproc(base_dir, as_template=False)[source]¶

Generates the preprocessing file path.

Args:

base_dir: Base directory under which the output is stored. as_template (optional, bool): If enabled the run is kept as a

template instead of being filled in (default: False).
Return:
Preprocessing directory and file name, each as string.
process(base_dir, use_xfel_format, as_template=False)[source]¶

Generate the process file path.

Args:

base_dir: Base directory under which the output is stored. use_xfel_format (bool): If enabled the output is in xfel

format.
as_template (optional, bool): If enabled the channel is kept as a
template instead of being filled in (default: False).
Return:
Process directory and file name, each as string.
raw(base_dir, as_template=False)[source]¶

Generates raw path.

Args:
base_dir: Base directory under which the raw directory can be
found.
as_template (optional, bool): If enabled the channel is kept as a
template instead of being filled in (default: False).
Return:
Raw directory and file name, each as string.
